title: StarChartHandler
description: The definition of a Star Chart handler.

handler.description: The name of the handler function to invoke.

functionId.description: The ID of the function. Defaults to the name of the folder.

functionName.description: The name of the function. Defaults to the function ID.

environment.description: The environment variables to set for the handler.

warmer.description: The warmer to use to keep the handler warm. Defaults to enabled, rate: 10 minutes.

ruleName.description: The name to give the scheduled rule. Defaults to prefixing the name of the handler.

ruleNamePrefix.description: The prefix to give the scheduled rule. Defaults to the name of the handler.

description.description: The description to give the scheduled rule.

rate.description: The rate at which to invoke the handler. Must be a valid rate expression. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/events/ScheduledEvents.html for more information.

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be enabled. Defaults to true.

input.description: The input to pass to the handler. Defaults to an empty object. Conflicts with inputPath and inputTransformer

inputPath.description: The JSONPath to use to extract the input to pass to the handler. Conflicts with input and inputTransformer.

inputTransformer.description: The input transformer to use to transform the input to pass to the handler. Conflicts with input and inputPath. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eb-transform-target-input.html for more information.

inputPaths.description: The JSONPaths to use to extract the input to pass to the handler.

inputTemplate.description: The template to use to transform the input to pass to the handler.

items.description: The events that will trigger the handler.

path.description: The HTTP path for the route. Must start with / and must not end with /.

authorizer.description: The name of the authorizer to use for the route.

queueId.description: The ID of the SQS queue to subscribe to.

batchSize.description: The maximum number of messages to retrieve from the queue at once. Default is 1.

visibilityTimeoutSeconds.description: The visibility timeout of the queue.

messageRetentionPeriodSeconds.description: The message retention period of the queue.

kmsMasterKeyId.description: The ID of the KMS key to use to decrypt messages.

maxMessageSize.description: The maximum message size of the queue.

receiveWaitTimeSeconds.description: The receive wait time of the queue.

kmsDataKeyReusePeriodSeconds.description: The data key reuse period of the queue.

tags.description: The tags to apply to the queue.

FifoSettings.description: The FIFO settings to use when retrieving messages from the queue.

enabled.description: Whether to enable FIFO queue support. Default is false.

contentBasedDeduplication.description: Whether to enable content-based deduplication. Default is false.

deduplicationScope.description: The scope of the deduplication. Default is queue.

throughputLimit.description: The throughput limit of the queue. Default is perQueue.

DlqSettings.description: The dead-letter queue settings to use when messages are not processed.

suffix.description: The suffix to append to the queue name to create the DLQ.

maxReceiveCount.description: The maximum number of times to receive a message.

redriveEnabled.description: Whether to enable the redrive policy.

visibilityTimeoutSeconds.description: The visibility timeout of the DLQ.

messageRetentionPeriodSeconds.description: The message retention period of the DLQ.

receiveWaitTimeSeconds.description: The receive wait time of the DLQ.

EventbridgeSettings.description: The EventBridge event bus to subscribe to.

eventBusId.description: The name of the event bus to subscribe to.

eventPattern.description: The event pattern to filter on.

detail-type.description: The detail type of the event.

ruleName.description: The name to give the scheduled rule. Defaults to prefixing the name of the handler.

ruleNamePrefix.description: The prefix to give the scheduled rule. Defaults to the name of the handler.

description.description: The description to give the scheduled rule.

rate.description: The rate at which to invoke the handler. Must be a valid rate expression. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/events/ScheduledEvents.html for more information.

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be enabled. Defaults to true.

input.description: The input to pass to the handler. Defaults to an empty object. Conflicts with inputPath and inputTransformer

inputPath.description: The JSONPath to use to extract the input to pass to the handler. Conflicts with input and inputTransformer.

inputTransformer.description: The input transformer to use to transform the input to pass to the handler. Conflicts with input and inputPath. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eb-transform-target-input.html for more information.

inputPaths.description: The JSONPaths to use to extract the input to pass to the handler.

inputTemplate.description: The template to use to transform the input to pass to the handler.

Publishes.description: The events that the handler may publish.

eventbridge.description: Publishes an event to an EventBridge event bus.

eventBusId.description: The name of the event bus to publish to.

detailType.description: The detail type of the event.

PublishSqs.description: Publishes an event to an SQS queue.

queueId.description: The ID of the SQS queue to publish to.

Resources.description: The resources that the function will use.

DynamodbResource.description: A DynamoDB table that is used by the function.

dynamodb.description: A DynamoDB table that is used by the function.

actions.description: The actions to allow on the table.

iamActions.description: Custom IAM actions to add to the role.

SecretResource.description: A secret that is used by the function.

anyOf.description: A secret that is used by the function.

ParameterResource.description: An SSM parameter that is used by the function.

anyOf.description: The path to the SSM parameter.
An SSM parameter that is used by the function.

path.description: The path to the SSM parameter.

S3Resource.description: An S3 bucket that is used by the function.

s3.description: An S3 bucket that is used by the function.

CustomResource.description: A custom resource that is used by the function.

custom.description: A custom resource that is used by the function.

arn.description: The ARN of the custom resource.

iamActions.description: Custom IAM actions to add to the role.
